summary: This is a monthly bank statement from the Municipal Credit Union (MCU) for an account holder named TOVA A NOEL, covering June 2019. It shows deposits from government entities (DFEC TREAS 310, DOJ TREAS 310) and numerous personal expenditures. The statement reveals the account holder received government payments during this period.

persons.name: Tova A Noel
persons.context: The individual whose name and address (Bronx, NY) are on the bank statement. The account shows deposits from government entities and personal spending.

events.title: Monthly Bank Activity for Tova A Noel
events.description: A series of deposits and withdrawals on a personal checking account, including two significant deposits from 'DFEC TREAS 310' and one from 'DOJ TREAS 310'.

keyFacts: The account holder, Tova A Noel, received an ACH deposit of $2,279.25 on June 13, 2019, from 'DFEC TREAS 310' (likely a U.S. Department of Education/Financial Management Service source).
The account holder received an ACH deposit of $600.00 on June 14, 2019, from 'DOJ TREAS 310' (U.S. Department of Justice Financial Management Service).
The account shows a pattern of personal spending at retail stores, restaurants, beauty services, and for utilities (Verizon, E-ZPass) throughout June 2019.
The document is a standard personal bank statement with no direct, explicit mention of Jeffrey Epstein, his associates, or his criminal activities.
